Include details, not shown above, re time, place, manner of last entry, and elements which establish administrative and/or criminal violation. Indicate means and route of travel to interior.) SUBJECT was brought to ABQ Office by an official of Karler Ment Packing Company, to be interviewed by a SVC officer to determing his (alien's) status. SUBJECT was in possession of SW-434 reflecting adm. as B-2 at ELp on 3-29-71 to 4-8-71 & I-186.
